v8:item.v8:content: Amount of the payment made by order, in the contract currency
Сумма произведенной оплаты по заказу, в валюте договора
Suma achitării efectuate conform comenzii în valuta contractului

Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref, DocumentCustomerOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentCustomerOrder.Number, DocumentCustomerOrder.Date, DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted, DocumentCustomerOrder.Author, DocumentCustomerOrder.BankAccount, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType, DocumentCustomerOrder.JobKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.PricesKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.ShippingDate, DocumentCustomerOrder.Contract, DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed, DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.PettyCash, DocumentCustomerOrder.Comment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty, DocumentCustomerOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentCustomerOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentCustomerOrder.IncludeVATInCost, DocumentCustomerOrder.Entity, DocumentCustomerOrder.Responsible, DocumentCustomerOrder.Project, DocumentCustomerOrder.Event, DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder, CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Cancelled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentCustomerOrder.Start, DocumentCustomerOrder.BaseUnitSales, DocumentCustomerOrder.BaseUnitReserve, DocumentCustomerOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentCustomerOrder.CashType, DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish, DocumentCustomerOrder.Cell, DocumentCustomerOrder.Inventory.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Batch, Quantity, Reserve, UnitOfMeasure, Price, DiscountMarkupRate, Amount, VATRate, VATAmount, TotalAmount, ShippingDate, Specification ), DocumentCustomerOrder.ConsumerMaterials.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Quantity, UnitOfMeasure, ReceiptDate ), DocumentCustomerOrder.PaymentCalendar.( Ref, LineNumber, PayDate, PaymentPercentage, AmountOfPayment, PayVATAmount ), DocumentCustomerOrder.Jobs.( Ref, LineNumber, JobKind, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Quantity, Price, Amount, DiscountMarkupRate, VATRate, VATAmount, TotalAmount, Content, LinkKey, Multiplicity, Factor ), DocumentCustomerOrder.Assignees.( Ref, LineNumber, Employee, LPF, AccrualDeductionKind, AmountAccrualDeduction, LinkKey ), DocumentCustomerOrder.Materials.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Batch, Quantity, Reserve, UnitOfMeasure, LinkKey ), DocumentCustomerOrder.Prepayment.( Ref, LineNumber, Document, SettlementsAmount, ExchangeRate, Multiplicity, PaymentAmount ), DocumentCustomerOrder.PointInTime, InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers.AmountOfPaymentTurnover AS AmountOfPaymentTurnover, DocumentCustomerOrder.hiDocumentAmountWithoutVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.hiDocumentVATAmount FROM Document.CustomerOrder AS DocumentCustomerOrder LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InvoicesAndOrdersPayment.Turnovers AS InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers.InvoiceForPayment

v8:item.v8:content: Amount of the payment made by order, in the contract currency
Сумма произведенной оплаты по заказу, в валюте договора
Suma achitării efectuate conform comenzii în valuta contractului

Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref, DocumentCustomerOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentCustomerOrder.Number, DocumentCustomerOrder.Date, DocumentCustomerOrder.Posted, DocumentCustomerOrder.Author, DocumentCustomerOrder.BankAccount, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentCustomerOrder.TransactionType, DocumentCustomerOrder.JobKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.DiscountMarkupKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.PricesKind, DocumentCustomerOrder.ShippingDate, DocumentCustomerOrder.Contract, DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed, DocumentCustomerOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentCustomerOrder.PettyCash, DocumentCustomerOrder.Comment, DocumentCustomerOrder.Counterparty, DocumentCustomerOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentCustomerOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentCustomerOrder.IncludeVATInCost, DocumentCustomerOrder.Entity, DocumentCustomerOrder.Responsible, DocumentCustomerOrder.Project, DocumentCustomerOrder.Event, DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder, CASE WHEN (DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT DocumentCustomerOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentCustomerOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Cancelled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentCustomerOrder.Start, DocumentCustomerOrder.BaseUnitSales, DocumentCustomerOrder.BaseUnitReserve, DocumentCustomerOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentCustomerOrder.CashType, DocumentCustomerOrder.Finish, DocumentCustomerOrder.Cell, DocumentCustomerOrder.Inventory.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Batch, Quantity, Reserve, UnitOfMeasure, Price, DiscountMarkupRate, Amount, VATRate, VATAmount, TotalAmount, ShippingDate, Specification ), DocumentCustomerOrder.ConsumerMaterials.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Quantity, UnitOfMeasure, ReceiptDate ), DocumentCustomerOrder.PaymentCalendar.( Ref, LineNumber, PayDate, PaymentPercentage, AmountOfPayment, PayVATAmount ), DocumentCustomerOrder.Jobs.( Ref, LineNumber, JobKind, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Quantity, Price, Amount, DiscountMarkupRate, VATRate, VATAmount, TotalAmount, Content, LinkKey, Multiplicity, Factor ), DocumentCustomerOrder.Assignees.( Ref, LineNumber, Employee, LPF, AccrualDeductionKind, AmountAccrualDeduction, LinkKey ), DocumentCustomerOrder.Materials.( Ref, LineNumber, Nomenclature, Characteristic, Batch, Quantity, Reserve, UnitOfMeasure, LinkKey ), DocumentCustomerOrder.Prepayment.( Ref, LineNumber, Document, SettlementsAmount, ExchangeRate, Multiplicity, PaymentAmount ), DocumentCustomerOrder.PointInTime, InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers.AmountOfPaymentTurnover AS AmountOfPaymentTurnover, DocumentCustomerOrder.hiDocumentAmountWithoutVAT, DocumentCustomerOrder.hiDocumentVATAmount FROM Document.CustomerOrder AS DocumentCustomerOrder LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InvoicesAndOrdersPayment.Turnovers AS InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers ON DocumentCustomerOrder.Ref = InvoicesAndOrdersPaymentTurnovers.InvoiceForPayment
